Japanese:
みて！
後ろにいるのはオートマンだよ。
English:
Look!
There's an Automan behind it.

Japanese:
あのコマンドティーガー、
追われてるんだ！
English: It's chasing that Commando Tiger!

Japanese:
このままだと
八工房会議がメチャクチャだ。
English: At this rate, the Eight Workshop's conference is going to be ruined.

Japanese:
/p、頼むぞ。
八工房会議を邪魔させるな。
English:
/p, we're counting on you.
Don't let it interrupt the Eight Workshop's conference.

Japanese: オートマンを倒すんだ。
English: Destroy the Automan.

Japanese:
事情はよくわからないけど、
あのコマンドティーガーも
助けた方がよさそうだね。
English: I don't really know what's going on, but it looks like you're going to have to help that Commando Tiger too.

Japanese:
/p、八工房会議を守り
ながら、コマンドティーガーを
助けるんだよ。
English: /p, rescue that Commando Tiger whilst defending the Eight Workshop's conference.

Japanese:
あれは、ベルソン重工の
軍事用マリオネーションギア。
English: That's the military Marionation Gear by Bellson Industries.

Japanese: 八工房会議を襲うつもりか！
English: Are they planning to attack the Eight Workshop's conference!?

Japanese: オーギュスト＿冷静な顔

そもそもの始まりは、
人形師ファウスト。
English: This whole matter began with the Puppet Maker, Faust, in the first place.

Japanese: やつの目的は何だったのか？
English: And what were his motives?

Japanese:
無人の自動人形。
そして、それを製造する
人形都市。
English:
Automatic mechs that don't need to be manned.
And now, they're being manufactured by the Mech City.

Japanese:
なぜ、そんなものが
必要だったのか？
English: But why would such a thing be necessary?

Japanese:
やつは、神にでも
なろうとしたか……。
English: Maybe he was trying to become something like a god...?

Japanese:
もっと
合理的な目的があったと
考えるべきでしょう。
English: Couldn't you come up with a more rational answer than that?
A motive, eh..?

Japanese:
単に、技術追求の結果かも
しれん。
English: It could simply be the result of his desire for new technology.

Japanese: 職人とはそういうものだ。
English: That's what artisan's are like.

Japanese:
確かに彼は、
自動人形の技術を
極めたといっていい。
English: It's true that it'd be fair to say he had his heart set on automatic mech technology.
But what was it all for?
Faust's goals...

Japanese: オーギュスト＿冷静な顔

自動生産される無人の人形。
考えてみて欲しい。
English:
Automatic production for unmanned mechs. 
Please think about it.

Japanese:
我々は、ごく最近、
似た技術を見たはず。
English: We've seen similar technology not that long ago.

Japanese: フランバード＿冷静な顔

English: Bellson Industries!?

Japanese:
ナイトシェイドが使っていた
軍事用マリオネーションギアを
製造していた企業ね？
English: You mean the military-grade Marionation Gear that Nightshade were using was produced by them?

Japanese: オーギュスト＿基本姿勢

そう。
ベルソン重工は、量産型のマリ
オネーションギアを生み出した。
English:
Exactly.
Bellson Industries were the mind behind mass-producing Marionation Gear.

Japanese:
コマンドティーガーの生産
台数は、すでに我々八工房の
１０年分以上。
English: The production output of the Commando Tiger's was already ten years ahead of our Eight Workshops.

Japanese:
コマンドティーガーの
製造工場……。
English: A factory for producing Commando Tigers...

Japanese:
確かに、
人形都市に近いシステムだと
いえるかもしれん。
English: That system certainly sounds like similar to the Mech City.

Japanese: オーギュスト＿基本姿勢

ベルソン重工は、コマンド
ティーガーの工場を作るため、
研究を続けてきた。
English: In order to produce the Commando Tigers, Bellson Industries continuing researching.

Japanese:
ベルソン重工は、
さまざまな工房へ
資金援助をおこなっていた。
English: Bellson Industries sponsored several workshops.

Japanese:
だが、それもすべて、
人形工場を完成させるため……
というわけか。
English: But, that was all for the sake of completing their mech factory... so you say?
Exactly.

Japanese:
そして、ファウストに資金を
提供していたのも、
ベルソン重工だ。
English: Plus, Bellson Industries were also supplying funds to Faust.
What!?

Japanese: オーギュスト＿基本姿勢

ベルソン重工は、ファウストに
資金援助することで、
人形都市の技術の一部を得た。
English: By funding Faust, Bellson Industries were able to get their hands on some of the technology behind the Mech City.

Japanese:
しかも、彼らは今回の騒動を
利用し、コマンドティーガーに
よって莫大な利益を得ている。
English: What's more, is that by taking advantage of the turmoil created by the Commando Tigers, they would have able to make a huge profit.

Japanese:
ということは、ファウストを
裏で操っていたのは、
ベルソン重工か！？
English: So you're saying the people pulling the strings behind Faust is Bellson Industries!?

Japanese: オーギュスト＿基本姿勢

English: That is the most likely case.

Japanese: モクヨウ＿ちょっとした驚き

それが本当なら、
すぐにでもベルソン重工を
調査しなければ……。
English: If that's true, then we should start investigating Bellson Industries immediately...

Japanese:
待ってくれ！
緊急連絡だ。
English:
Hold up!
I've got an urgent message.

Japanese:
この会場に、ベルソン重工製の
マリオネーションギアが
近づいている。
English: Bellson Industries' Marionation Gear are approaching this assembly hall as we speak.

Japanese: アンジェリカ＿大きな驚き

English: What did you say!?
